title: Voice-Activated Task Management – Voice Reminders for Medication and Appointments
justification: This subOption directly supports Sarah's core goals of managing appointments and ensuring her clients take their medications on time. It also addresses her challenges with clients who may struggle with technology, allowing her to provide reminders in a straightforward manner without overwhelming them.
subOption: Voice reminders for medication and appointments

title: Real-Time Health Monitoring Alerts – Emergency Alert System for Caregivers
justification: The emergency alert system aligns with Sarah's goal of ensuring the safety and well-being of her clients, allowing her to receive immediate notifications if any health anomalies arise. This capability addresses her concern about timely intervention without compromising the privacy of her clients.
subOption: Emergency alert system for caregivers

title: Simplified Communication Tools – One-Touch Video Calling Feature
justification: The one-touch video calling feature aligns with Sarah's need for effective communication with her clients, allowing her to quickly connect with them or their family members in a straightforward manner. This capability directly supports her goal of maintaining clear communication while managing multiple clients efficiently.
subOption: One-touch video calling feature

title: User-Friendly Interface Customization – Simplified Navigation for Quick Access
justification: Sarah's role as a professional caregiver managing multiple clients requires her to quickly access critical information. Simplified navigation will help her efficiently manage appointments and health monitoring without the burden of a complicated interface, addressing her need for ease of use in a high-pressure environment.
subOption: Simplified navigation options for quick access

justification: Sarah needs to track multiple clients' health status in real-time and manage care schedules effectively. justification: This capability is crucial for Sarah, as she manages clients with varying levels of technology comfort and prefers intuitive interfaces. justification: This subOption is crucial for Sarah as it aligns with her need to manage multiple clients' health and care schedules effectively.
